comments:

CC Mike because he's been working in LaunchManager recently.

According to the error, it sounds like your ant build file is missing a document root element.

Can you post your ant file so we can try it to see if the LaunchManager is mis-behaving?
I do not believe it is the Ant buildfile that is missing anything but rather an ill formed launch configuration?
I've been unable to reproduce this one on I20060124-1115.
I can't produce this error either, even deleting the head node from a launch configuration file...
changing to WORKSFORME. Will reopen with better test case if I see this again.
